 28 -class MarkerCapture(object): 

 29      """ 
 30      Marker trajectory data captured synchronously for one or more markers. 
 31   
 32      @ivar sampleTimes: Sequence of times at which samples were taken. 
 33      """ 
 34   

 35 -    def __init__(self): 

 36          """ 
 37          Initialise capture. 
 38          """ 
 39          self._markers = dict() 

 40   

 41 -    def _addMarker(self, marker): 

 42          self._markers[marker.id] = marker 

 43   
 44      @property 

 45 -    def markers(self): 

 46          """ 
 47          List of the markers in this capture. 
 48          """ 
 49          return self._markers.values() 

 50   

 51 -    def marker(self, id): 

 52          """ 
 53          Get a marker by identifier. 
 54   
 55          @return: The L{Marker} with the given identifier. 
 56          """ 
 57          return self._markers[id] 

 58   

 59 -class Marker(AbstractTrajectory): 

 60      """ 
 61      A motion capture marker of any type. 
 62      """ 
 63   

 64 -    def __init__(self, capture, id): 

 65          """ 
 66          Initialise marker. 
 67   
 68          @param capture: Parent L{MarkerCapture}. 
 69          @param id: Marker identifier. 
 70          """ 
 71          self.capture = capture 
 72          self.id = id 
 73          self.capture._addMarker(self)

 79 -    def __init__(self, capture, id): 

 80          Marker.__init__(self, capture, id)

 83 -class Marker6DOF(SampledRotationTrajectory, Marker3DOF):

 91 -class SplinedMarkerCapture(MarkerCapture): 

 92      """ 
 93      Wrapper to obtain splined versions of all marker trajectories in a capture. 
 94   
 95      @param sampled: L{MarkerCapture} with sampled marker data. 
 96      @param kwargs: Keyword arguments to pass to spline trajectory constructors. 
 97      """ 

 98 -    def __init__(self, sampled, **kwargs): 

 99          self.sampled = sampled 
100          self._markers = dict() 
101          for marker in sampled.markers: 
102              if isinstance(marker, Marker6DOF): 
103                  markerClass = SplinedMarker6DOF 
104              else: 
105                  markerClass = SplinedMarker3DOF 
106              self._markers[marker.id] = markerClass(self, marker, **kwargs)
